content: Kwik-X Dual Action Anchor Dual Action Anchor System includes KH-EZ screw anchors and KHC adhesive capsules. For fastening in concrete with performance of adhesive anchors and installation speed and simplicity of screw anchors ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Chemical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Unmatched combination of load capacity, productivity and simplicity – new dual-action technology combining the performance of adhesive anchors with the installation speed and simplicity of screw anchors Easier to install – SafeSet method and pre-configured adhesive capsules reduce the number of steps in the installation process and eliminate the need for accessories like brushes, air pumps and dispensers Up to 4x faster installation than injectable mortars – significantly reduce labor costs due to faster, easier setting with an impact driver, and possibility of immediate loading Extensive technical data including ESR for concrete, seismic category A-F – maximum application coverage and design flexibility fully supported by the PROFIS Engineering software suite Applications Fastening structural and non-structural steel baseplates to concrete Industrial fastenings – racking, machinery and other equipment The Kwik-X Dual Action anchor comprises the KHC adhesive capsule and the KH-EZ screw anchor for high-performance anchoring of steel to concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material temperature at installation - range: -18 - 104 °F Tested/approved for diamond drilling: Yes, with DD 30-W SAFEset: Yes Technical Data | Base material temperature at installation - range | -18 - 104 °F | Tested/approved for diamond drilling | Yes, with DD 30-W | SAFEset | Yes | Installation tools | SIW 4AT-22 ½” Cordless impact wrench, SIW 6-22 ½” Cordless impact wrench | Removable | Yes | In-service temperature – range | -40 - 176 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 41 - 77 °F | PROFIS Software | Yes ### ITEMS- 3946922 - Kwik-X KH-EZ 1/2x5 + 1/2 LARGE(25pc) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 25x KH-EZ 1/2 x 5 Screw - 25x KHC 1/2 Large Adhesive capsule - 3946924 - Kwik-X KH-EZ 1/2x6 + 1/2 LARGE(25pc) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 25x KH-EZ 1/2 x 6 Screw - 25x KHC 1/2 Large Adhesive capsule - 3946926 - Kwik-X KH-EZ 1/2x7 + 1/2 LARGE(25pc) -
